nodes.text: Wilpiet was a planet located within the Wilpiet system of the Outer Rim Territories near Granse Space.

Wilpiet was the site of an Alliance depot during the reign of the Galactic Empire. The Rebel crew of the Waterspire operated in the area of Wilpiet. However, the bounty hunter Milacass stole the Waterspire at least two months after joining the Granse Confederacy, damaging Rebel property in the process. Following this, Milacass was added to the "most wanted" list of the Rebel Alliance.
